page.title: 17EVENTS,GOSFORTH IN CUMBRIA.
page.content: Wellington.The village however still looks like a village, the estates being off the main road. {Events.}Although Gosforth is small,there is a strong community spirit. In 1985 it won the Cumbrian award as the best kept large village,a joint effort from everyone. The main event of the year is the Gosforth Show. This is a typical Agricultural Show. The morning sees the judging of prize animals, cattle being brought from far afield. Later comes the pony and trap display, the horse jumping and the dog show and the Hound trail. There are two giant marquees holding a large selection of garden & craft exhibits. There is, of course, the beer tent, the tea tent and many smaller side stalls.
